Title: Commissions a disparity study to determine the level of participation of women and minority businesses in state contracting and requires establishment of programs and goals based on the results of such study
Summary: Commissions a disparity study to determine the level of participation of women and minority businesses in state contracting; requires establishment of programs and goals based on the results of such study.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to commissioning a disparity study to determine the level of participation of women and minority businesses in state contracting and requires establishment of programs and goals based on the results of such study
